name: SpeechLanguageTherapyProcedureHCPCS
title: Speech Language Therapy Procedure HCPCS
purpose: (Clinical Focus: General speech-language pathology therapy procedure.),(Data Element Scope: Generic speech-language pathology therapy procedure that may qualify a patient for home health care  as defined by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.),(Inclusion Criteria: General speech-language pathology therapy procedure.),(Exclusion Criteria: Rehabilitation therapy procedures generally described as physical therapy or occupational therapy.)

concept.display: Services performed by a qualified speech-language pathologist in the home health or hospice setting, each 15 minutes

Services performed by a qualified speech-language pathologist, in the home health setting, in the establishment or delivery of a safe and effective speech-language pathology maintenance program, each 15 minutes
Speech therapy, in the home, per diem
